title: Not a great choice
text:
Good: the room was clean and the bed is very comfort
Bad: the fridge was empty. Very hude staff, they were not happy at all with simple questions. Poor breakfast, only one juice (not natural) and not many options, also extremely busy, they would need another restaurant for all those clients that they have from Turkish airlines
place: Mercure Istanbul West Hotel & Convention Center

title: Just good
text:
Great hotel, nothing to different from normal. Nice decor. The location isn't the best, seems to be a bit dodge. The hotel is clean and all staffs very friendly.
Breakfast average. The rooftop bar is extremely expensive but with a nice view

title: Lovely view
text: Perfect to visit on a sunny day, I would recommend to go at the end of the day to see the sunset. Just attention to the close time, as it changes throughout the year

title: Tasteless
text: The food just didn't taste at all, was really plain. The Greek salad was just tomato's and a huge slice of feta cheese. At lest the staff was friendly
